org.spf4j.base

Interface Callables.PreRetryCallback<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Callables.RetryPauseWithTimeout
    Enclosing class:
    Callables

    public static interface Callables.PreRetryCallback<T>

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean call(Exception lastException, T lastResult)
      This is executed before doing a retry.

    • Method Detail

      • call

        boolean call(Exception lastException,
           T lastResult)
             throws InterruptedException
        This is executed before doing a retry. any delay, or other retry logic is done here.
        Parameters:
        lastException - - last exception encountered, if null, retry does not happen because of exception.
        lastResult - - if lastException is null this value represents the last returned result.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
